name: InfluenzaTestsForUnspecifiedInfluenzaVirusAntigen
title: Influenza (Tests for unspecified influenza virus Antigen)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for test names to detect unspecified Influenza antigen),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify laboratory tests names),(Inclusion Criteria: unspecified Influenza virus Ag),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
